alternatives.transcript: hello and welcome to this special training presentation prepared for you by the RJ Reynolds tobacco company we at RJ r-- have contracted with your company to complete a very important task for us you'll be completing this task along with hundreds of other people all over the country during the exact same three day period what is this important task

simply put we need you to visit retail stores in your area and make sure that special promotional signs are placed on our product displays in those stores these signs promote special discounted prices that are only available for a limited time so it's critical that all of these promotional signs get into the stores as quickly as possible now let's talk about what we expect of you during this three-day period due to the fact you are interacting with our valued customers BP

light and courteous at all times since you are acting as a representative for our company RJ Reynolds tobacco you should always conduct yourself in a professional manner we do expect you to be professional in the way you dress appropriate dress projects a professional business image that will Aid in your interactions with our retail clients they will take you more seriously as our representative and this will allow you to do your job more quickly and efficiently here are some guidelines

guidelines for you to use to determine if you are dressed appropriately dress should be casual but conservative collared shirts and slacks for men no jeans t-shirts or sneakers women May wear dresses a skirt and blouse or slacks and a blouse again no jeans t-shirts or sneakers whatever your choice please be sure to conservative and professional

next you'll be expected to visit 45 retail stores during this three-day work period That's approximately 15 visits per day that may seem like a lot but if you pace yourself you should be able to accomplish them easily these visits must only be conducted Monday through Wednesday between the hours of 8 a.m. and 5 p.m. if you find yourself with a few visits incomplete at 5 p.m. on Wednesday you are permitted to complete them on Thursday morning

do not continue to make visits after the 5:00 p.m. deadline on any work day finally you'll be expected to complete written reports on each visit you make and return these reports to us don't worry the reports are very simple and easy to complete we'll discuss the reports in more detail later before you begin your visits you'll be provided with several items that you'll need to do your job the items you will be provided are a call list

tivity Report Form promotional materials which include all the signs you'll be expected to place in the retail stores and a letter from RJ Reynolds Tobacco Company introducing you to the retailer as our representative let's talk about going out on your first store visit your supervisor will provide you with a call list which is nothing more than a list of all the stores you are expected to visit it is a range geographically to minimize your travel time between stores

you will need to transfer the information on your call list to the activity report form for example before your first call you'll need to fill in the sis number territory Number store name and address of your first store on the activity report form all of this information will be on the call list you may have this on a laptop computer if your company is supplied a computer to you which means that all of the information will be completed electronically

let's watch as a representative enters a store and introduces herself to the manager it is customary to ask for the store manager in some cases the manager may not be in but most store personnel are aware of the promotions and would be more than willing to cooperate

hi I'm Sarah with ABC temporary services may I speak with your store manager please yes I'm the store manager how can I help you I've been contracted by RJ Reynolds tobacco company to ensure the placement of discounted pricing signs during the promotional period grade how can I help I noticed that you just have any discounted pricing signs for RJ Reynolds tobacco company in the store did you receive a Pricing Kit recently from RJ R yes I did I just haven't had time to put them up here it is right here thank you

I'll be happy to place these for you in order to put the correct pricing on these can you tell me your discounted price for Camel and Winston during this promotional period yes it's 35 cents off making the discounted price 289 a pack thank you can you tell me your regular unpromoted prices well yes it's 3:24 pack Thank You by asking for the unpromoted price you can subtract the promotional discount value and ensure the accuracy of the $2.99 promotional price

as quoted to you the representative is now ready to start placing the signs for the retailer let's look at the signs in more detail and watch the rep is she places them the Pricing Kit contains four different types of signs all four are designed for a different purpose and placement all four types of signs are shipped without pricing information printed on them that's because the price may vary with different retailers so it's very important to ask the retailer at each

door for their individual pricing discount before you place the signs in the store you must first use the enclosed font pack to place the appropriate pricing on each sign the font pack has two sizes of numerals one inch and 3 inch use the size that is appropriate to the spacing on the sign the first type of sign is the Paster which is a large sign meant to go on the door or in the front window always ask the retailer

Taylor whether it is acceptable to place advertising where it is visible from the street this sign should be visible to the consumer at the point of entry that is as they enter the store due to some state and local ordinances the retailer May inform you that he or she cannot have the advertising on the front of the store please ask if you can place the sign somewhere else preferably at the point of purchase

the second sign is the point of purchase easel card this sign sits near the cash register in the prime selling area to catch the consumers I as they make a purchase in those rare occasions where the easel Card cannot be placed on the counter then attempt to adhere the wobbler somewhere in this Prime selling area the easel card is far more impactful and every attempt should be made to place this unit over the wobbler

and finally the point of display sign is placed where the actual product is displayed this sign is meant to capture the consumers attention once you have a fixed the pricing fonts on the front of the display sign simply attach it to the top of the display fixture using the small plastic Clips if there are no plastic Clips on the fixture use some from your supply of promotional material the clips attached using double stick tape

one additional point this advertising will be changing on a quarterly basis these four main pieces will remain consistent just the ad copy will change in order to keep a fresh look and gain the attention of our consumers

you'll need to repeat this procedure for all of the Winston and camel displays in each store typically you'll only find one display for Winston and one display for Camel but you may encounter more than two displays or a single combined display occasionally you may see a display fixture with a roll price indicator already attached in this instance first make sure the price shown is the same as the discounted price given to you by the retailer if it is not

roll the numbers until the correct price is displayed now take your point of display sign and tear off the perforated portion showing the special offer verbiage then attach it using plastic Clips to the top of the Roll price indicator on the fixture you may also see this role price indicator that has this special offer card held in by adapter Clips simply remove the special offer card and place it in the back adapter and ensure the correct price is showing

on the roll pricer and special offer card the retail stores that merchandise their cigarettes by the pack at a self-service location are what we call traditional pack outlet stores in a traditional pack outlet store the product is displayed in countertop displays where the customer can select the product himself or herself however you may encounter other types of stores and we want to show you what to do in those situations

there are retail stores that primarily merchandise their cigarettes by pack and carton behind the counter we call this merchandising concept the new world set in a new world set the product displays are behind the counter not on the counter in a self-serve location in these stores you should still place a Paster sign at the point of entry and a point of purchase easel card or wobbler sign near the cash register be sure you put discounted pricing information

and on each of the signs in this type of store the point of display sign will be placed behind the counter near the product on these displays you'll find existing price signs near both the camel and Winston packs simply take your point of display sign with the discounted pricing and slide it into the display over the existing signs do not remove the existing signs as they will be used again after the special price promotion is over

you may also encounter this type of display sign which is a sliding price or unit all you need to do is Slide the advertising piece to the left to ensure the appropriate discount amount is correct we have many variations of signage in our new world sets you will only need to be concerned with the two types of signs we just showed you for the placement of this display card if you encounter any other type of signage on the new world set don't be concerned about it and move on to complete the call

lastly let's take a look at Outlets that sell their cigarettes primarily by the carton and how they merchandise their product in these stores you'll want to accomplish the same tasks as in the other types of stores place a Paster at point of entry on the front window or door again Ask the retailer if it is acceptable to place advertising where it is visible from the street next place the point of purchase easel card at the prime selling area if

see any counter displays of Winston and camel follow the same procedures on those displays as we discussed earlier the only sign peace that is different in a carton Outlet is this signage piece here that is affixed to the carton unit itself we call this a cantilever sign the only thing you'll need to do is change the you save price
and the retail carton price

well that pretty much covers the different kinds of signs you'll be using and the types of stores you may encounter but there are a few more things we need to discuss what do you do if the retailer does not have a promotional Pricing Kit

sorry I don't know where that pricing kid is we might have thrown it away that's okay RJ Reynolds tobacco company has supplied me with the signs you need would you like me to place them for you sure that'd be great what do you do with the store personnel State they do not have the authority to allow you to place any pricing material in those cases checkbox 8 on your activity form which states store refuse Services also write a brief comment on why in

comment section and have the store personnel sign it proceed to your next call during your calls you may find that the retailer has already placed the promotional signs in these instances simply verify that all of the signs are in place and correctly marked with the discounted pricing remember there should be signs at the point of entry front window or door the point of purchase Prime selling area and on the point of display if any of these signs are missing ask the retailer

if you can place the signs for him if all of the signs are placed correctly indicate this on your activity report form and proceed to the next store since we're talking about the activity report form let's go over it in more detail as we mentioned at the start of this presentation you need to fill in the information for each store on a separate line on the activity report form there is space for five stores per activity report form you may use as many reports as

need to the right of the address information are eight checkboxes this is all the information you need to fill out on the activity report form checkbox one a if the retailer has already placed a discount pricing Paster on the window or door at the point of entry checkbox to be if the retailer has placed the discount pricing signs on the product display at the point of purchase checkbox 3 see if the retailer

ER has placed the discount pricing easel card or wobbler at the point of purchase Prime selling area if the retailer has not placed these items then leave the boxes blank if the retailer has not placed the discount signs and does not have a pricing kitten the store check box 7 the next three boxes are there to verify that you placed items for the retailer if you placed pricing on the window or door at the point of entry then check for a

if you placed pricing on the displays then checkbox 5B if you place the easel card or wobbler then checkbox 6C after you have completed the report please have the Retailer's sign the form on the right side and indicate his or her title we've discussed a lot of different situations you may encounter but what do you do if the retailer doesn't cooperate let's take a look at how our rep handles that

hello I'm George with ABC temporary services may I speak with the store manager please I'm the manager what do you want I've been contracted by RJ Reynolds tobacco company to ensure the placement of discounted pricing signs during the promotional period look I don't care who you say you are I'm not letting anybody put up any signs in here you got it yes sir I appreciate your time thank you very much

notice the representative didn't argue with the manager or try to convince him to change his mind he simply thanked him for his time and left if you encounter an uncooperative manager simply thank them for their time and leave the store be polite at all times no matter how the store personnel behave remember these are our customers and we do not want to offend or insult them just check on the activity report form box 8 store refuse services

Write a brief comment as to why in the comments section and have the store personnel sign you can then proceed to your next call after you have completed all of your assigned calls double-check your activity report forms to make sure they are filled out correctly you should have enough activity report forms to account for all 45 calls that were assigned to you make sure that you have accurately reported on all 45 calls next be sure to return all the

activity report forms as you've been directed it is critical that we receive this information as quickly as possible after your calls have been completed your supervisor will tell you the proper procedures for returning the completed activity report forms if you have any questions about any of the information in this presentation please ask your supervisor they'll be glad to help on behalf of the RJ Reynolds tobacco company I want to thank you for your time and attention
